sentence.Network_en: These dams have restricted the flow of the river downstream.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些堤坝限制了河水顺流而下。

sentence.Network_en: Entrance to universities and senior secondary schools was restricted.
sentence.Network_cn: 进入大学或高中的资格受到限制。

sentence.Network_en: The government imprisoned dissidents, forbade travel, and restricted the press.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府囚禁了持不同政见者，禁止出游，并且限制了新闻自由。

entry.def: Something that is restricted is quite small or limited.

example.ex: ...the monotony of a heavily restricted diet...
example.tran: 受到严格限制的饮食的单调

example.ex: Plants, like animals, often have restricted habitats.
example.tran: 植物和动物一样，生活环境常常有限。

entry.tran: 仅限…使用的;仅限…所有的
entry.def: If something is restricted to a particular group, only members of that group have it. If it is restricted to a particular place, it exists only in that place.

example.ex: Discipline problems are by no means restricted to children in families dependent on benefits...
example.tran: 绝不只是依靠救济金生活的家庭的孩子才有纪律问题。

example.ex: The problem is not restricted to the southeast.
example.tran: 这个问题并不只存在于东南部。

entry.def: A restricted area is one that only people with special permission can enter.

example.ex: ...a highly restricted area close to the old Khodinka airfield.
example.tran: 老科丁卡机场附近的一个禁区

entry.tran: (文件等)保密的，仅限于内部的
entry.def: A restricted document is one that only people with special permission can read.

example.ex: The charge was that, in February 1975, he had leaked a restricted document to a journalist.
example.tran: 对他的指控是他在1975年2月将一份保密文件泄露给了一位记者。

means.word_mean: 1. subject to restriction or subjected to restriction;
2. restricted in meaning; (as e.g. `man' in `a tall man')
4. the lowest level of official classification for documents

auth_sentence.content: Her life in London was hardly restricted to work.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her life in London was hardly restricted to work.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her life in London was hardly restricted to work.

auth_sentence.content: The same applies to video and other rights-restricted content.
auth_sentence.res_content: The same applies to video and other rights-restricted content.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The same applies to video and other rights-restricted content.

auth_sentence.content: Position is full-time and initially restricted for two years.
auth_sentence.res_content: Position is full-time and initially restricted for two years.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Position is full-time and initially restricted for two years.

means.word_mean: 有一定限制的,有限的,受约束的

sentences.en: A restricted import quota was set for meat products.
sentences.cn: 肉类产品设定了进口配额。

sentences.en: He has a severely restricted diet.
Access to the documents remains restricted to civil servants.
sentences.cn: 这些文件仍仅限公务员使用。

sentences.en: Access to this information is severely restricted.
sentences.cn: 这一信息的使用受到极严格的限制。

sentences.en: Abortion is restricted in some American states.
sentences.cn: 在美国的一些州堕胎是受限制的。

sentences.en: Access to employees’ records is restricted.
sentences.cn: 查阅雇员档案的权利是受到限制的。
